      <h2 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.8rem; margin-top: 40px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: 600;">3. Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR/RODO)</h2>

      <h2 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.8rem; margin-top: 40px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: 600;">5. Data Sharing and Disclosure</h2>

      <h2 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.8rem; margin-top: 40px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: 600;">8. Your Rights Under GDPR/RODO</h2>

      <div style="background: #F8F9FA; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; margin: 20px 0;">

      <h2 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.8rem; margin-top: 40px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: 600;">9. Data Security</h2>
      <p>We implement robust security measures to protect your data:</p>

        <li style="margin-bottom: 10px;"><strong>Regular Audits:</strong> Security assessments and vulnerability testing</li>

      <h2 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.8rem; margin-top: 40px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: 600;">10. Cookie Policy</h2>
      
      <h3 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.3rem; margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-weight: 600;">10.1 What Are Cookies?</h3>
      <p>
        Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. 
        They help us provide a better user experience and analyze website performance.
      </p>

      <h3 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.3rem; margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-weight: 600;">10.2 Types of Cookies We Use</h3>
      
      <div style="background: #F8F9FA; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; margin: 15px 0;">
        <h4 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1rem; margin-bottom: 10px; font-weight: 600;">Essential Cookies (Always Active)</h4>

      </div>

      <div style="background: #F8F9FA; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; margin: 15px 0;">
        <h4 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1rem; margin-bottom: 10px; font-weight: 600;">Analytics Cookies (With Consent)</h4>
        <p style="margin-bottom: 0;">
          Help us understand how visitors use our website (e.g., Google Analytics with IP anonymization).
        </p>
      </div>

      <div style="background: #F8F9FA; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; margin: 15px 0;">
        <h4 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1rem; margin-bottom: 10px; font-weight: 600;">Functionality Cookies (With Consent)</h4>
        <p style="margin-bottom: 0;">
          Remember your preferences and settings for a personalized experience.
        </p>
      </div>

      <h3 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.3rem; margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-weight: 600;">10.3 Managing Cookies</h3>
      <p>
        You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may

        <a href="https://www.aboutcookies.org" style="color: #FF9900;" target="_blank" rel="noopener">www.aboutcookies.org</a>.
      </p>

      <h2 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.8rem; margin-top: 40px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: 600;">11. Children's Privacy</h2>

      <h2 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.8rem; margin-top: 40px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: 600;">12. Changes to This Privacy Policy</h2>

      </p>
      <ul style="margin-left: 20px; margin-top: 15px;">

        <li style="margin-bottom: 10px;">Prominent notice on our website</li>
        <li style="margin-bottom: 10px;">Updated "Last Modified" date at the top of this policy</li>

      <h2 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.8rem; margin-top: 40px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: 600;">13. Complaints and Supervisory Authority</h2>

        <li style="margin-bottom: 10px;"><strong>Australia:</strong> Office of the Australian Information Commissioner (OAIC) - <a href="https://www.oaic.gov.au" style="color: #FF9900;" target="_blank">oaic.gov.au</a></li>
      </ul>

      <h2 style="color: #2C2C2C; font-size: 1.8rem; margin-top: 40px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: 600;">14. Contact Us</h2>
